command_group: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config

commands.name: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config remove
commands.summary: Remove connection config to ExpressRoute circuit connection.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config remove --circuit-name
                                                               --name
                                                               --peering-name
                                                               --resource-group
                                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config remove -g MyResourceGroup --circuit-name MyCircuit --peering-name AzurePrivatePeering -n myConnection

commands.name: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config set
commands.summary: Set connection config to ExpressRoute circuit connection.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config set --circuit-name
                                                            --name
                                                            --peering-name
                                                            --resource-group
                                                            [--address-prefix]
                                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config set -g MyResourceGroup --circuit-name MyCircuit --peering-name AzurePrivatePeering -n myConnection --address-prefix .../125

commands.name: az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route peering connection ipv6-config wait [--circuit-name]
                                                             [--created]
                                                             [--custom]
                                                             [--deleted]
                                                             [--exists]
                                                             [--ids]
                                                             [--interval]
                                                             [--name]
                                                             [--peering-name]
                                                             [--resource-group]
                                                             [--subscription]
                                                             [--timeout]
                                                             [--updated]
